Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th   buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Lafayette, 76th, Vincennes and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th   buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Lafayette, 76th, Vincennes and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Lafayette.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
